serviceTypes.title: Residential Electrician
serviceTypes.info: Mishaps in the supply of power for any reason can lead to great inconveniences for you, your family or other occupants of the residential premises.

serviceTypes.title: Commercial Electrician
serviceTypes.info: As a business owner, you have to think about what to do about the power outages which may be caused by weather or mechanical failures.

serviceTypes.title: Industrial Electrician
serviceTypes.info: Our electricians are well trained to perform their tasks with a lot of precision and care which are offered in explosion-proof environments.

projects.title: Recent Projects
projects.info: Below you can see some shots from our recent projects. There are some photos from our Residential, Commercial, Industrial works

info.title: Company Information
info.desc:
LAC Electric Inc. Is an independent electrical contracting firm located in the heart of San Fernando Valley, California, serving the greatest Los Angeles County and neighboring cities for over 18 years and counting and more than 60 years of combined experience with expertise in commercial and residential installations on new and remodeling buildings, our staff have successfully completed a variety of projects for the private and public sector construction industry.
Now you can download LAC Electric Inc.

objectives.title: Company Objectives
objectives.desc: At LAC Electric Inc. our main goal is to provide our clients with the best possible experience and customer service available whether is just  a simple installation to a complete new system, we gladly help our customers make their dreams come true in a timely manner and budget, quality, honesty, reliable and friendly are just a few qualifications we have received from our satisfied clients over the years in service.
